mapper.insert: insert into sys_order(pay_id, recv_id, park_id, park_time, rent, create_time, update_time, del_flag, status, remark) VALUES (#{payId}, #{recvId}, #{parkId}, #{parkTime}, #{rent}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag}, #{status}, #{remark})
mapper.select: select * from sys_order where status = 0 and pay_id = #{payId}
